United States > Connecticut > enfield fast food Restaurants in enfield, ct 1 - 10 of 22 fast-food restaurant listings found. Next >>
RATING 5.0 Polish Delicatessen Fast Food 8 Alden Avenue, Enfield (860) 745-5390 LATEST REVIEW We hold a monthly meeting here and it is a hidden gem. The room is lovely, the owners delightful, kind and helpful. The food is delicious and abundant. I hope more will discover this terrific banquet facility and deli store. REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
RATING 4.0 Denny's Restaurant American, Casual/Family, Fast Food, Breakfast 111 Elm Street, Enfield (860) 745-2260 LATEST REVIEW The food is what you'd expect from Denny's. Open 24 hours a day with some of the quickest and friendliest service I've received in a long time. Hungry at 2 AM for some hot cakes and some french fires? Denny's is a must! REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
RATING 1.5 Kentucky Fried Chicken American, Fast Food 16 Hazard Avenue, Enfield (860) 741-5505 LATEST REVIEW This classic KFC restaurant houses some delicious fried goodness, but the service is very much lacking in quality and speed. Often I find myself waiting for what seems an eternity for my food. If you plan on eating here, bring a magazine to keep your... REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
